title: Nineteen Lincolns
description: portrait of bearded man dressed as President Lincoln; man sits looking to PR with hands resting on thighs; silver watch chain attached to vest; red, gold and silver belt buckle slightly visible under vest; blurry line of trees and blue sky in distance; framed behind glass in black wood frame; one of a set of 18 photographs to be displayed together
creditline: The Shirley Mahowald and Henry Kinsell Endowment for Art Acquisition
